name: wagmios
description: Wagmios is a self-hosted dashboard for monitoring crypto wallets or DeFi positions, aggregating balances and metrics into a clear web interface for long-term holders.
features: Wallet monitoring: Track multiple crypto wallets and DeFi positions across different blockchains in one unified dashboard.
Balance aggregation: Automatically aggregate token balances and display total portfolio value with real-time price updates.
Transaction history: View complete transaction logs with timestamps, amounts, and gas fees for comprehensive record keeping.
Multi-chain support: Monitor assets across Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, and other EVM-compatible networks simultaneously.
Portfolio analytics: Visualize asset allocation, performance trends, and historical value changes with interactive charts.
Custom alerts: Set up notifications for balance changes, large transactions, or price movements to stay informed.
Privacy-focused: Self-hosted solution ensures wallet addresses and holdings remain private without third-party tracking.
Read-only access: Monitor wallets without requiring private keys or seed phrases for maximum security.
Export functionality: Generate reports and export data in CSV or JSON formats for tax reporting or analysis.
Responsive interface: Access your crypto dashboard from any device with a mobile-friendly web interface.
